Title: Chou Futsuu Toshi Kashiwa Densetsu: Ekimae Housou UDC2-hen
Description: ['Original videos featuring the cast of ', Chou Futsuu Toshi Kashiwa Densetsu, ' that are supported by the Kashiwa Urban Design Center (UDC2). They are set at Kashiwa Station and are both released online and broadcast at the station.']
